project.context.localization.common.superclasses

Class MeasureClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.context.localization.common.superclasses.CommonClass
      • project.context.localization.common.superclasses.MeasureClass

  • public abstract class MeasureClass
extends CommonClass
    The Measure class offers a convenient method measureWiFi() to start measuring a user's WiFi surrounding and define Fingerprints by setPlaceString(String) After a predefined scan count setScanCountMax(int), the measurements are saved in the database. These entries are then used later in AverageMeasuresClass and LocalizationClass to aggregate WiFi-AP RSSis and to locate the user.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String placeString
      The Place id string is used to assign the measurement to a place.
      int scanCountMax
      The property defines the maximum count of scans.
      protected java.util.List<WiFiMeasurement> wiFiMeasurements
      The Wlan measure list holds all scan results for the WiFI-Access point environment.

    • Method Detail

      • deleteAllMeasurements

        public void deleteAllMeasurements()
        Delete all measurements.

      • deleteAllMeasurementsForPlace

        public void deleteAllMeasurementsForPlace()
        Delete all measurements for a specific place.

      • measureWiFi

        public void measureWiFi()
        Initiates the measuring process. This method gets called by the activities. In a first step, a result receiver for the WiFi results gets registered. Then, the WiFi scanning starts and a progress is shown to the user.

      • outputDebugInfos

        protected void outputDebugInfos(java.util.List<WiFiMeasurement> wiFiMeasurementList)
        Output debug infos.
        Parameters:
        wiFiMeasurementList - the list containing measurement results of the WiFi access points in the current area.

      • setPlaceString

        public void setPlaceString(java.lang.String placeString)
        Sets place id string.
        Parameters:
        placeString - the place string

      • setScanCountMax

        public void setScanCountMax(int sMax)
        Sets the max scan count.
        Parameters:
        sMax - the s max

      • showMeasureProgress

        protected void showMeasureProgress()
        Show measure progress in progress output. Should be overridden by devices like Moto 360 to be substituted by other UI elements, that fit the plattform best.

      • showMeasuresSaveProgress

        protected void showMeasuresSaveProgress()
        Show save progress.

      • stopMeasuring

        public void stopMeasuring()
        Stops measuring. Therefore it unregisters the result receiver. In the end it hides the progress dialog/output.

      • updateMeasurementsCount

        public abstract void updateMeasurementsCount()
        Update measurements count. Normally gets called after new measurements are saved in the db, so that changes can be queried after they are done.
